Is Meesmann corneal dystrophy inherited ?,"This condition is inherited in an autosomal dominant pattern, which means one copy of an altered KRT12 or KRT3 gene in each cell is sufficient to cause the disorder. In most cases, an affected person inherits the condition from an affected parent.",GHR,Meesmann corneal dystrophy
